With this tool, you can create new quests, characters, weapons, armor, landscapes, and more. You can also use it to edit existing content or install mods created by other users.

The crack is a file that replaces the original executable of Skyrim Creation Kit and allows it to run without Steam verification. To apply the crack, you will need to extract "crack.rar" using WinRAR or 7-Zip.
 
You will get a file named "CreationKit.exe". Copy this file and paste it into the folder where you installed Skyrim Creation Kit, usually "C:\Program Files (x86)\Skyrim Creation Kit". You will be asked to overwrite the existing file. Click "Yes" to confirm.
